snippet: Senator John McCain said recent airstrikes just outside the Syrian capital were likely to increase pressure on President Obama to offer more forceful support to Syrian rebels.
abstract: Senator John McCain said recent airstrikes just outside the Syrian capital were likely to increase pressure on President Obama to offer more forceful support to Syrian rebels.

headline.main: McCain Says Airstrikes in Syria Put Pressure on Obama to Act
